content: a free version is available here on the knitter knotter blog 1 do you dream of spreading your wings wide and traveling the world on a breeze you can now with this shawl that evokes dove wings open and ready to fly this is an easy and quick project perfect for beginners but it can also be spiced up with overlay stitches use a worsted or aran weight yarn or hold different yarns together to work up this shawl in a unique combination of colors and textures us terms and video are available for free charts and uk terms available in the paid pdf version **captioned video ** the video tutorial linked in this pattern is available on youtube and is fully captioned with manual captions 1 https //knitterknotter com/easy-crochet-shawl-pattern-dove-wings-by-andrea-cretu/
